.....Seller pay % for buyer's agent...... Welcome to Your Dream Home: A Perfect Blend of Comfort and Modern Style Imagine stepping into a home where every detail has been carefully considered, from the sleek new kitchen to the beautifully landscaped backyard. This beautifully remodeled home is ready for you to move in and start making memories. With brand new upgrades throughout, including a tankless smart water heater worth $4,000, new appliances, hardwood floors, bathrooms, Kitchen, over the range microwave and moreâ€”this house has everything you need for modern living. A Kitchen That Inspires If you love to cook (or even if you don't!), the new kitchen is a chef's dream. With stainless steel appliances, ample counter space, and plenty of storage, this kitchen makes meal prep a breeze.. Relax and Unwind in the Spacious Bathrooms. Featuring a separate tub and shower, double sinks, and modern finishes, this bathroom has been designed with comfort in mind. Whether you're getting ready for the day or winding down at night, you'll feel pampered every time you step in... A Backyard for Entertaining Outside, the huge backyard offers endless possibilities for outdoor entertaining, gardening, or simply relaxing under the sun. The yard features fruit trees such as peach, guava, figs, and pomegranate perfect for those who love fresh produce straight from their own garden. And with solar lights lining the space, evenings spent outside will feel magical, and all for just $65 a month for solar energy Upgraded Feat

Upgraded Features for Modern Living
This home has been completely updated with features designed for today's lifestyle:
Brand new hardwood floors that bring warmth and elegance to every room with unique wooden blinds.
A cozy fireplace perfect for chilly evenings
Brand new over-the-range microwave for added convenience
New playground set in the backyard for the little ones to enjoy
Landscaping with solar lights that make the outdoors feel as special as the indoors..Located in a quiet, family-friendly neighborhood. Whether you're relaxing inside or enjoying the backyard with the stylish grill island, gazebo and Charcoal and propane grill for the new owner to Enjoy, you'll find a sense of serenity here that's hard to beat.

This home combines comfort, style, and modern upgrades to create the perfect living space. Ready to make this house YOUR home? Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity!
